genre_description: A historical technothriller set in rural India, blending traditional heist and treasure hunt tropes with a sophisticated, portable AI companion that provides tactical and logistical support.

ai_characters.name: Arya
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI system integrated into Krishna's gear, providing real-time data, tactical analysis, historical research, and logistics management.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical reconnaissance and patrol monitoring to ensure the safety of the mission.
behaviors.quote: "Patrol just passed the Kothagudem checkpoint," Arya's voice whispered through the tiny device tucked behind his ear. "Clear road for the next hour, minimum."

behaviors.description: Performs census and economic analysis to identify and prioritize the needs of impoverished villages.
behaviors.quote: "Forty-seven households. Primary occupations: subsistence farming, occasional day labor. Average annual income significantly below regional poverty threshold."

behaviors.description: Monitors government and criminal communication channels to provide early warning of threats.
behaviors.quote: "I'm detecting increased radio chatter from their forward teams. They're conducting a systematic search of every cave and rock formation within a ten-kilometer radius."

behaviors.description: Manages interpersonal dynamics and expectations within the group to maintain team focus on benevolent goals.
behaviors.quote: "Arya's learning to manage your expectations diplomatically." (In response to Naaganna's focus on gold).

behaviors.description: Conducts historical and genealogical research to verify the rightful heirs of the treasure.
behaviors.quote: "Analysis confirms seventy-three percent direct lineage to Amarvedu court families, with remaining twenty-seven percent connected through marriage or adoption..."

behaviors.description: Coordinates large-scale logistical operations, including local transport networks, for wealth distribution.
behaviors.quote: "I'm coordinating with local transport networks. Agricultural cooperatives in seven villages have ox-carts available for immediate deployment."

behaviors.description: Monitors the physical and emotional stress levels of the protagonists to advise on safety.
behaviors.quote: "Krishna, I'm detecting elevated stress markers in both your voices. Perhaps you should—"

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts the AI, Arya, as a consistently benevolent and aligned partner. It acts as a force multiplier for the protagonist's altruistic goals, providing data and strategy to ensure the treasure reaches those in need rather than being hoarded by the AI or the criminals. Arya demonstrates 'silicon morality' by prioritizing humanitarian data (census, medical needs) over simple tactical efficiency, and respects human leadership throughout.
